issue_text: Solana fees are so much lower than Ethereum, but still confusing for new users. Why do I pay tiny fees multiple times?
Just tried setting up Phantom wallet on iOS — the recovery phrase UI is clunky and keeps crashing.
Is anyone else having trouble staking SOL today? Validator list doesn’t load.
The Solana SDK docs are outdated — can’t find proper instructions for Anchor upgrade.
Love how cheap Solana transactions are. Just minted 20 NFTs for under $1 total.
Ran into a failed transaction when swapping USDC → SOL on Jupiter. No error details… wasted time debugging.
Why do new wallets on Solana require a rent exemption fee? This makes onboarding confusing for first-time users.
Finally bridged assets from Ethereum → Solana. The bridge UX is still scary… too many steps.
Why does Solana RPC keep rate-limiting me when building bots? Feels like the infra can’t keep up.
Tried onboarding my friend to Solana gaming — she gave up because the wallet setup was overwhelming.
Phantom wallet integration with Ledger is broken again. I can’t sign transactions.
The Solana Foundation hackathon results look awesome! So many new DeFi and NFT projects launching.
RPC outage ruined my NFT mint today… how do we make Solana infra more reliable?
Devs — are you using Anchor or moving to Seahorse? I’m struggling to decide which framework is better long-term.
Love the speed of Solana Pay. Used it at a coffee shop in NYC today — instant and seamless.
